meanings.definition: To remove the ovaries from (an animal)
meanings.sent1: The veterinarian ovariectomized the cat to prevent unwanted litters.
meanings.sent2: The farmer decided to ovariectomize the cow for health reasons.
meanings.sent3: It was quite a sight to see the skilled surgeon ovariectomize the rabbit with precision.
meanings.sent4: The decision to ovariectomize the dog was like removing a burden from its shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The procedure to ovariectomize the guinea pig was quick and efficient.

meanings.sent1: The ovariectomized cat recovered well after surgery.
meanings.sent2: The ovariectomized dog seemed calmer and more relaxed.
meanings.sent3: The ovariectomized rabbit hopped around happily in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The ovariectomized cow was now free from certain health risks.
meanings.sent5: The ovariectomized guinea pig was a beloved pet in the household.
